Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Pork Roast
Lawlry Salk Free Seasoning and wash
Chilli Powder and wash
Garlic Powder
Olive Oil

Recipe

Put Pork Roast in bowl
Cover pork roast with Lawlry Salk Free Seasoning on both sides
Cover pork roast with Chilli Powder on both sides
Cover pork roast with Garlic Powder on both sides
Put pork roast in ziplock bag
Put Olive Oil in bag
Wait 8 hours Put ziplock bag in refridgerator for 8 hours
Wait 270 minutes Put pork roast in slow cooker on low for 4 and a half hours
Wait 10 minutes Take pork roast out of slow cooker and let sit for 10 minutes
Trim excess fat
